member.name: ID3D12CommandList.GetType
member.summary: Gets the type of the command list, such as direct, bundle, compute, or copy.
member.returns: This method returns the type of the command list, as a enumeration constant, such as direct, bundle, compute, or copy.

member.name: ID3D12CommandList
member.summary: An interface from which inherits. It represents an ordered set of commands that the GPU executes, while allowing for extension to support other command lists than just those for graphics (such as compute and copy).
